title: Lush lemon pepper chicken
description: This tasty tray bake is super easy - all the flavour comes from the delectable honey and mustard marinade.
ingredients: 3-4 tsp cracked black pepper, to taste
4 bone-in chicken breasts, skin removed, each breast scored three or four times using a sharp knife
salt and freshly ground black pepper
handful chopped fresh flatleaf parsley leaves, to serve
